English.Text: The sailors, especially the men, feel humiliated. "Those warrior women were most strident," says one, "I had absolutely no idea how I should respond to such provocation, for I believe it was always their intention to make us draw our swords upon them, which of course would have been wholly inappropriate!" The women, on the other hand, can't help but dream of escaping this suffocating ship, to take up a lance and shield of their own.
